Me and Kinger discussed it and decided that it would take longer than 
a week to rebuild the Ark. Much longer. So its mutual agreement that 
his last post is void.

::Prowl::

The acid did its job, and connection to Prowl's head was restored, 
instantly accompanied by a burning pain from his neck. It felt like 
he was on fire!

Prowl shudders, trying to idnore the pain from his neck as he rolls 
over and sits up.

"What happened?" he asks through clenched teeth from the pain, 
looking at Iron Raptor, still a bit dazed from his fall.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> * Iron Raptor continued to dig around a bit in the back of Prowls 
neck until 
> she finally felt it, the severed wire which was disconnected from 
Prowls 
> main processor.
> This would be a simple fix...if she understood this body right.
> 
> It was half her second beast mode if she knew nothing else, and she 
knew 
> just what it could do.
> Simply leaning down she removed her claw from his neck, and grabbed 
the back 
> of Prowl's neck with her mouth, biting in a bit deep.
> The acid which acted as her saliva would seep into thr wound her 
claw made, 
> actually repairing what little damage there was in the back of 
Prowls head.
> This is what acted as her repair system, and she just hoped that it 
would do 
> alright with Prowl.*
